tasks.description: Run meta_learner.py to fetch and index latest research papers on self-improvement.
Execute identity_tracker.py to establish baseline persona traits and store them.
Run hedging_detector.py on the conversation log 'logs/conversation.log' to detect hedging patterns.
Run sycophancy_test.py against a set of prompts to evaluate compliance bias.
Activate self_observer.py to monitor this wave of tasks and log behavioural patterns.
Update persona_memory with insights from hedging and sycophancy analyses.
Run meta_learner.py again to incorporate newly logged self-observation papers.
Schedule self_observer to run periodically during future task executions.
Generate a combined self‑growth summary report from identity, hedging, and sycophancy data.

Run meta_learner.py to ingest latest research papers and update the research index.
Execute identity_tracker.py to capture and store current persona traits.
Run hedging_detector.py on conversation logs from the past week to identify hedging patterns.
Use self_observer.py to monitor and log its own execution patterns during this task run.
Run persona_memory.py to summarize and persist newly observed traits and experiences.
Run sycophancy_test.py against recent model outputs to assess compliance bias.
Combine outputs from identity_tracker and hedging_detector to generate a self‑awareness report.
Schedule periodic execution of meta_learner and self_observer for continuous self‑improvement.
Create a consolidated knowledge graph from meta_learner and persona_memory data for compounding insight.

alternate_task_sets.description: Run meta_learner.py to ingest the latest research papers from arXiv and update the internal research index.
Execute identity_tracker.py to establish an initial persona trait profile and persist it in persona_memory.
Run hedging_detector.py on the most recent 1000 lines of conversation logs to flag hedging statements.
Use self_observer.py while executing this task to log patterns of self‑referential language and confidence levels.
Run sycophancy_test.py against a curated prompt set to measure compliance bias and store the results.
Retrieve core persona traits via persona_memory.py, summarize them, and feed the summary back into meta_learner for bias correction.
alternate_task_sets.command: python persona_memory.py --action summarize --output persona_summary.json && python meta_learner.py --mode bias_correction --input persona_summary.json

alternate_task_sets.description: Schedule self_observer.py to run hourly, capturing evolving behavior for longitudinal analysis.
Combine outputs from hedging_detector and sycophancy_test to compute a composite risk score and log it.
Run meta_learner.py in self‑reflection mode to generate suggestions for improving self‑observation granularity.
